00020 
00033 MTKt_status MtkBlsToLatLon(
00034   int path,              
00035   int resolution_meters, 
00036   int block,             
00037   float line,            
00038   float sample,          
00039   double *lat_dd,  
00040   double *lon_dd    )
00041 {
00042   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00043   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00044   double som_x;         /* SOM X */
00045   double som_y;         /* SOM Y */
00046 
00047   if (lat_dd == NULL || lon_dd == NULL)
00048     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00049 
00050   status = MtkBlsToSomXY(path, resolution_meters, block, line, sample,
00051              &som_x, &som_y);
00052   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00053 
00054   status = MtkSomXYToLatLon(path, som_x, som_y, lat_dd, lon_dd);
00055   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00056 
00057   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00058 
00059 ERROR_HANDLE:
00060   return status_code;
00061 }
